title: Red Lobster's Pina Colada Dipping Sauce
directions: Prep Time: Minutes ━ Difficulty: Easy ━ Servings: Servings
Melt butter in WOK or stainless steel frying pan. Slowly add the wine.
Sprinkle Worcestershire sauce over mushrooms. I like to make sure there is some over every mushroom.
Sprinkle salt and pepper over mushrooms. Sprinkle minced garlic over all.
Saute; stirring occasionally over medium heat until mushrooms are tender and the sauce and wine are reduced, approximately 15 - 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1 cup Piña Colada mix (Your favorite brand)
